Entries.Charlie: Oh wow this is amazing! Thank you!/84 64 103 395/How nice of you, this is great./96 97 98 99/Oh.. well it's the though that counts I guess./88 90/Gross... You're Gross.../68 70/Thanks/80 82//

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Charlie in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Charlie in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Charlie... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and... well, husband!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5373: @... Charlie... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Charlie... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and husband!$h

Entries.Inside.1: Fresh cookies! Too bad that isn't for you...
Entries.Inside.2: Oh, a globe! And here is Stardew Valley, but you can't find Pelican Town
Entries.Inside.3: His fridge, It's full of veggies, and... Why there is an Ancient Doll here in there?
Entries.Inside.5: You look at the mirrior. You look beautiful today. Just today.
Entries.Shop.1: Why are you looking into the trash can?
Entries.Shop.2: Randy looks happy with his new home.
Entries.Shop.4: Why people always let these open books on the floor?
Entries.Spouse.1: These arcades are protected with a password...
Entries.Spouse.2: You notice something under the sofa... It's just a old board game.
Entries.Spouse.3: You take a look on Charlie's table... It has some letters to Sandy, and some paperwork.
